DOC.brief_summary: Case control design: lipidomic study in 12 type 2 diabetics with metabolic syndrome, 12 metabolic syndrome without diabetes, 12 subjects with type 1 diabetes and 12 controls
DOC.brief_title: Characterization of Low Density Lipoprotein and Mechanism of the Pro Aggregant Effect Through Oxidant Stress and Lipid Exchange
DOC.criteria: statin and fibrate Wash out for one week HbA1c>7% and <12% (Arms 1 and 3) HbA1c<6% (Arms 2 and 4) Metabolic sd according NCEP III (3 out 4 criteria) (Arms 1 and 2) secondary CV prevention
